snippet: Shares of several companies, like Deere & Company and Nordstrom, fell after they released weak earnings or outlooks.
abstract: Stocks remain mostly flat, as tech shares help offset continued drop in oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Shares of several companies, like Deere & Company and Nordstrom, fell after they released weak earnings or outlooks.

headline.main: Tech Stocks Climb Higher, but Market Is Little Changed
headline.print_headline: Tech Stocks Move Up, but Market Barely Budges
